name: Downside Up (zettovyker, Squid1501, StylizedtoDeath, Stefenism)
description:
A secret science lab experiment has gone wrong that has flipped the entire world upside down - and it's up to you to save the day! 

Use your complimentary government issued grappling hook to grab onto the 'ceiling' and travel around town.  In Downside Up, you'll enjoy:

  • Swinging around a concrete jungle!
  • Collect Magical doodads to save the day!
  • Get sassed by a robit AI!
  • [REDACTED]
  • and so much more!

Team: ArraysStartAtNegativeOne
[This game is an entry to the EPIC Mega Gamejam 2019 - using the theme "down to earth"]

[CONTROLS]

WASD = MOVE

SPACEBAR = JUMP

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON = HOOK SHOT

DANCING = OPTIONAL
